post.title: First blog post
post.body:
##  I never thought I'd have a blog

Is this "The begginning of the end"?

> I'll never have a blog cause nobody cares
> - me, 2002


but now I know I gotta promote myself, so here i am.

##### 
1. 

how to embed images this way. let's see what happens when a p tag breaks into two lines. maybe this will work or perhaps it will looks bollocks. do you not want to break? is this my destiny to have the widest page on earth?



does this work?

![a random image.  **layout:left,background:red-500**](**cdn**cld-sample-5)

> ### Life is a quote for those who will have it
> idk, yolo by me

javscript code

```js
const idk = 17
const another = 12
```

python code

```python
idk = 'hello'
what: int = 17
```
